Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Francisco
ShortDescription:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a mechanical problem.

 Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Francisco due to a mechanical problem.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Kimball to Belmont to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include:
#81 Lawrence
#78 Montrose
#80 Irving Park

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
